replies.msg:
From雲海facebook:-

剛剛收到一位大學職員嘅訊息，睇完我真係唔識得幫，關於現今教育政策事宜，完全係我盲點，我1D都唔能夠掌握！咁我就話不如放上網等大家幫下啲細路或者等啲人幫手放上連登，大家幫手搞掂佢！以下係訊息內容:

「你好，我係大學一位小職員。

8月5日除左三罷之外，亦係大學聯招放榜的日子。

我好擔心有無被拘留的小朋友係等放榜，JUPAS 係限定5-7/8 一定要上網accept offer，如果被拘留，無電腦無手機乜都做唔到

雖然話都唔知未來係點，會唔會要坐監，但呢一刻無理由有offer但因為被捕而喪失學位。

全城焦點都在於三罷，唔知可以點幫到呢班可能有呢個需要的小朋友⋯⋯

補充一點，JUPAS accept offer 係要喺5-7/8 交$5000 acceptance fee 作實。」

2019 JUPAS Main Round Offer Results

We regret that you have not been offered a place by any of the participating-institutions in the Main Round.

Your application may be further considered by individual participating-institution(s) in the Clearing Round for programmes WITHIN your selected programme choices for which you are qualified, if places are still available.

Please login onto your JUPAS account on 25 Aug 2019 (from 9:00 AM) to check the Clearing Round offer results, registration procedures and the related information.

If you receive an offer in the Clearing Round, you will also be informed by the JUPAS Office by email and by SMS message (if you choose to receive) of the offer results.

Please refer to the JUPAS website for further details.﻿﻿﻿
